properties.description: Granite bench for visitors

properties.description: Large oak tree, approximately 150 years old

properties.description: Cluster of pine trees in southwest corner

properties.description: Small administrative building with records room

properties.description: Wooden bench facing west

properties.description: Bronze statue of praying hands

properties.description: Large weeping willow near pond area

properties.description: Memorial bench donated by Thompson family
properties.notes: In loving memory of Robert and Margaret

properties.description: Small angel statue surrounded by flowers
properties.notes: Dedicated to all children who passed too soon

properties.name: Southern Pine Stand
properties.description: Group of tall pine trees marking southern boundary

properties.name: Ancient Maple
properties.description: Massive maple tree, estimated 200+ years old

properties.name: Memorial Fountain
properties.description: Small decorative fountain with seating area

properties.name: Maintenance Shed
properties.description: Equipment storage building

properties.name: Memorial Avenue
properties.description: Main north-south path through cemetery - paved

properties.name: Oak Tree Lane
properties.description: Main east-west path, runs by the large oak tree - paved

properties.name: Veterans Way
properties.description: Curved path leading to veterans section - gravel
properties.notes: Small flags placed along path on Memorial Day

properties.name: Willow Path
properties.description: Southern cross path - paved

properties.name: Founders Walk
properties.description: Western boundary path near founder's plot - brick pavers

properties.name: Central Crossing
properties.description: Interior north-south path - paved

properties.name: Thompson Way
properties.description: Small path to Thompson family plot - flagstone

properties.name: Foster Lane
properties.description: Short path to founder's monument - cobblestone
properties.notes: Historic cobblestone path from town square

properties.name: Fountain Walk
properties.description: Path to memorial fountain - decorative pavers
properties.notes: Blue decorative pavers installed with fountain

properties.name: Heritage Trail
properties.description: Path through historic section - gravel

properties.name: Garden Path
properties.description: Small path to children's memorial garden - mulch
properties.notes: Natural mulch path, flowers planted seasonally

changes.action: Initial cemetery data import with comprehensive showcase data
Added 12 groups to demonstrate grouping features
Updated grid to non-rectangular shape to demonstrate custom boundaries
Added multiple road types with different colors (paved, gravel, brick, cobblestone, etc.)
